headline: Assessing Nasdaq (NDAQ) Valuation As Fintech Pivot And Adenza Deal Gain Traction
summary: Why Nasdaqâ€™s governance and tech moves matter for investors Nasdaq (NDAQ) is in the spotlight after a governance change that introduces limited officer exculpation and clarifies board powers, together with fresh momentum in its fintech tools through client partnerships. At the 2025 annual meeting, shareholders backed a charter amendment that adds limited protection for certain officers. This later received Securities and Exchange Commission approval and became effective in January 2026. The...
